education.area: Double B.S. (Hons) in Computer Science and Informatics

research.name: SEPE Research Group, UC Irvine
highlights: - Explored the impact of health and sleep data on cardiovascular disease (CVD) risks using enhanced explainable AI (XAI) models.
- Achieved 89% prediction accuracy by incorporating sleep pattern data and utilized SHAP to identify critical health indicators for CVD.

research.name: Ren Lab - The Chinese University of Hong Kong
highlights: - Optimized data analysis processes, achieving a 5% improvement in model accuracy.
- Conducted literature reviews to strengthen the project foundation.

research.name: Shi Lab - University of California, Irvine
highlights: - Developed Python algorithms for 'GO3D - Spatial Organization of Single-Cell Multiomic Data,' automating super-resolution imaging.
- Advanced imaging accuracy and efficiency for single-cell data analysis.
